str_usemod("advance",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},read).
str_usemod("advance",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("bar1",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("bar2",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("buffer_compress",s_func,fld{drf{root{arg{0}}},"buf","_Buffer"},read).
str_usemod("buffer_compress",s_func,fld{root{glob{"outgoing_stream"}},"next_in","__anonstruct_outgoing_stream_30"},write).
str_usemod("buffer_ptr",s_func,fld{drf{root{arg{0}}},"buf","_Buffer"},read).
str_usemod("buffer_read",s_func,fld{root{glob{"outgoing_stream"}},"next_in","__anonstruct_outgoing_stream_30"},deepread).
str_usemod("call_buffer_read",s_func,fld{root{glob{"outgoing_stream"}},"next_in","__anonstruct_outgoing_stream_30"},deepread).
str_usemod("call_buffer_read",s_func,fld{root{glob{"outgoing_stream"}},"next_in","__anonstruct_outgoing_stream_30"},write).
str_usemod("deref",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("foo1",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("foo2",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_loop{"s#0"},drf{root{arg{0}}},write).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_loop{"s#0"},drf{root{local{"x"}}},write).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_loop{"s#0"},root{arg{0}},read).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_loop{"s#0"},root{arg{1}},read).
str_usemod("loop_deref",s_loop{"s#0"},root{local{"x"}},write).
str_usemod("memcpy",s_func,drf{root{arg{0}}},read).
str_usemod("memcpy",s_func,drf{root{arg{1}}},read).
